title: Mastering Photopea Graphic Design
details: Comprehensive guide to professional graphic design using Photopea

title: Getting Started
details: Introduction to Photopea interface and basic operations

title: Interface Overview
details:
1. Open Photopea.com in your browser
2. Notice the toolbar on left (selection, brush, text tools)
3. Layers panel is on the right side
4. Properties panel changes based on selected tool
5. Top menu contains File, Edit, Image, Layer, Select, Filter options

title: Basic File Operations
details:
1. Click File > Open to open an image
2. Use File > Save As PSD to save project
3. For web: File > Export As > JPG/PNG (PNG for transparency)
4. Use Ctrl+O (Win) or Cmd+O (Mac) to quickly open files
5. Export settings: Quality 80-90% for JPG, PNG-24 for transparency

title: Canvas Management
details:
1. File > New (or Ctrl+N)
2. Set dimensions (e.g., 1200x800 pixels for social media)
3. Set resolution to 72ppi for web, 300ppi for print
4. Use Image > Canvas Size to adjust later
5. Alt+Mouse Wheel to zoom, Space+Drag to pan

title: Essential Editing Techniques
details: Core photo manipulation skills

title: Cropping and Resizing
details:
1. Select Crop Tool (C)
2. Drag edges to select area
3. For resizing: Image > Image Size
4. Check 'Constrain Proportions' to avoid distortion
5. For social media: Use preset ratios (1:1, 4:5, 16:9)

title: Background Removal
details:
1. Select Magic Wand (W) or Quick Selection Tool (W)
2. Click on background to select
3. Press Delete to remove
4. For complex edges: Select > Refine Edge (feather 1-2px)
5. Save as PNG to preserve transparency

title: Color Adjustments
details:
1. Image > Adjustments > Hue/Saturation (Ctrl+U)
2. Drag Hue slider for color change
3. For B&W: Image > Adjustments > Black & White
4. Use Levels (Ctrl+L) to adjust contrast
5. For skin tones: Adjust Reds/Yellows separately

title: Object Removal
details:
1. Select Clone Stamp Tool (S)
2. Alt+Click to sample clean area
3. Paint over unwanted object
4. For best results: Use small brush with 70% hardness
5. Use Healing Brush for textures

title: Transparency Management
details:
1. Remove background (see 2.2)
2. Check transparency in Layers panel (checkerboard pattern)
3. Use Eraser Tool (E) for manual cleanup
4. For semi-transparency: Adjust layer opacity
5. Always export as PNG-24

title: Text Effects and Typography
details: Professional text manipulation

title: Basic Text Styling
details:
1. Select Text Tool (T)
2. Click canvas and start typing
3. Change font in top toolbar
4. Adjust size (pt) and color (color box)
5. Use Character panel (Window > Character) for advanced options

title: Text Outlines and Strokes
details:
1. Double-click text layer in Layers panel
2. Check 'Stroke' in Layer Style
3. Set size (3-5px usually good)
4. Position: Outside for clean edges
5. Choose contrasting color (e.g., white text with black stroke)

title: Special Text Effects
details:
NEON:
1. Type text
2. Layer Style > Outer Glow (bright color)
3. Duplicate layer > Gaussian Blur 5px > Screen blend mode

GOLD FOIL:
1. Gradient Overlay (gold-yellow gradient)
2. Bevel & Emboss (chisel hard, size 5-8px)
3. Pattern Overlay with subtle texture

title: Text Masking
details:
1. Place image above text layer
2. Right-click image layer > Create Clipping Mask
3. Adjust image position with Move Tool (V)
4. Add stroke to text for better visibility
5. Can use any shape, not just text

title: Text Shadows
details:
DROP SHADOW:
1. Layer Style > Drop Shadow
2. Distance: 5-10px, Size: 5-10px
3. Opacity: 60-75%

LONG SHADOW:
1. Duplicate text layer
2. Fill with dark color
3. Edit > Transform > Skew
4. Place behind original text
5. Repeat for 3D effect

title: Photo Effects and Filters
details: Creative image transformations

title: Vintage Effects
details:
1. Image > Adjustments > Photo Filter
2. Choose Sepia or Warming Filter (85)
3. Add noise: Filter > Noise > Add Noise (2-5%)
4. Optional: Create vignette (see 4.4)
5. Reduce saturation slightly (-10 to -20)

title: Color Splash
details:
1. Desaturate image (Ctrl+Shift+U)
2. Add Hue/Saturation adjustment layer
3. Paint on layer mask with black brush
4. Reveal color only where you want it
5. Use soft brush (0% hardness) for smooth transitions

title: Duotone Effects
details:
1. Convert to grayscale: Image > Mode > Grayscale
2. Image > Adjustments > Gradient Map
3. Click gradient to edit colors
4. Choose two contrasting colors
5. Try blues/oranges or purples/yellows

title: Vignettes
details:
1. Filter > Lens Correction > Custom tab
2. Vignette section: Amount -30 to -60
3. Midpoint 30-50
4. Alternative: Elliptical Marquee > Feather 150px > Inverse > Levels to darken
5. Adjust opacity to taste

title: Pixelation
details:
MOSAIC:
1. Filter > Pixelate > Mosaic
2. Cell Size 10-30 squares

HALFTONE:
1. Convert to grayscale first
2. Filter > Pixelate > Color Halftone
3. Max Radius 4-8 pixels
4. Channel angles: 15, 45, 0, 30

title: Composition Techniques
details: Advanced image combining methods

title: Double Exposure
details:
1. Remove background from portrait (see 2.2)
2. Place landscape image above
3. Set blend mode to Screen or Overlay
4. Adjust opacity (50-70%)
5. Use layer mask to refine where images blend

title: Texture Overlays
details:
1. Find texture image (paper, grunge, etc.)
2. Place above your image
3. Set blend mode to Multiply or Overlay
4. Adjust opacity (30-70%)
5. Use layer mask to remove texture from key areas

title: Mirror Effects
details:
1. Duplicate layer (Ctrl+J)
2. Edit > Transform > Flip Horizontal/Vertical
3. Position flipped copy adjacent
4. Add gradient mask for seamless blend
5. Try with portraits for interesting symmetry

title: Polaroid Frames
details:
1. Image > Canvas Size (add 100px white space)
2. Use Rectangle Tool (U) for white border
3. Add Drop Shadow (see 6.1)
4. Optional: Add slight rotation (Edit > Transform > Rotate)
5. Write text below image with handwriting font

title: Lighting and Shadow Effects
details: Realistic lighting manipulation

title: Drop Shadows
details:
1. Select layer (text or object)
2. Layer > Layer Style > Drop Shadow
3. Distance: 5-15px (depends on size)
4. Size: 5-15px for softness
5. Angle: Match existing light source in image

title: Glow Effects
details:
1. Duplicate layer you want to glow
2. Filter > Blur > Gaussian Blur (5-15px)
3. Set blend mode to Screen or Linear Dodge
4. Adjust opacity (50-80%)
5. Optional: Add Outer Glow in Layer Style

title: Lens Flare
details:
1. Create new layer (black fill)
2. Filter > Render > Lens Flare
3. Choose flare type (50-300mm)
4. Set blend mode to Screen
5. Position flare where light would naturally hit

title: Bokeh
details:
1. New layer
2. Use Brush Tool (B) with soft round brush
3. Paint dots in varying sizes (3-20px)
4. Apply Gaussian Blur (2-5px)
5. Set blend mode to Screen or Overlay
6. Adjust opacity (50-70%)

title: Special Effects
details: Creative visual enhancements

title: Smoke Effects
details:
1. New layer
2. Use Smoke Brush (download if needed)
3. Paint with white on black background
4. Filter > Blur > Gaussian Blur (3-8px)
5. Set blend mode to Screen
6. Adjust opacity (50-80%)

title: Water Reflections
details:
1. Duplicate layer
2. Edit > Transform > Flip Vertical
3. Position below original
4. Add layer mask > Gradient (black to white)
5. Filter > Distort > Ripple (Small, 10-20%)
6. Reduce opacity (50-70%)

title: Rain Effects
details:
1. New layer (fill with black)
2. Filter > Noise > Add Noise (100%, Monochromatic)
3. Filter > Blur > Motion Blur (Angle 60-75°, Distance 15-30px)
4. Set blend mode to Screen
5. Adjust opacity (50-70%)
6. Add Gaussian Blur (1-2px) for softness

title: Soft Focus
details:
1. Duplicate layer
2. Filter > Blur > Gaussian Blur (10-20px)
3. Set opacity to 30-50%
4. Add layer mask
5. Paint with black brush on mask to reveal sharp areas (eyes, lips)
6. Optional: Add slight vignette

title: Branding and Social Media
details: Design for business applications

title: Logo Design
details:
1. Start with text or shape
2. Add Layer Styles (Stroke, Bevel, Gradient)
3. Keep it simple and scalable
4. Test in black & white first
5. Finalize in vector if possible
6. Export as PNG-24 with transparency

title: Watermarking
details:
1. Create transparent PNG logo (see 8.1)
2. Open image to watermark
3. Place logo in corner
4. Set opacity 20-40%
5. Optional: Add slight drop shadow for visibility
6. Save as copy to preserve original

title: Social Media Templates
details:
INSTAGRAM POST:
1. Canvas size: 1080x1080px
2. Add margins (safe zone)
3. Create consistent color scheme

STORY:
1. 1080x1920px
2. Place key elements in center
3. Use bold, readable text
4. Export as JPG (Quality 80+)

title: Workflow Optimization
details: Professional techniques and shortcuts

title: Layer Management
details:
1. Name all layers clearly
2. Use folders (Layer Groups) for organization
3. Color-code layers (right-click layer > Color)
4. Use Ctrl+Alt+Click to select layer content
5. Alt+Click between layers to create clipping masks

title: Batch Processing
details:
1. File > Scripts > Image Processor
2. Select source folder
3. Set file type (JPG/PNG)
4. Choose quality/resize options
5. Run
Alternative: Record Actions for repetitive tasks

title: Export Optimization
details:
JPG:
1. Quality 80-90%
2. Progressive for web
3. Baseline Optimized

PNG:
1. PNG-8 for simple graphics (256 colors)
2. PNG-24 for transparency
3. Use 'Export As' for size preview

Always check file size before uploading
